page.title: 04THE SEWING MISTRESS SAGA
page.content: The log books of Snaith Primary School contain the following saga relating to the relationship between Jabez Fieldhouse (Headteacher 1863) and his sewing mistress. {November 1863...}The girls are behind the boys, especially in arithmetic. They should not be judged by the same standard. {December 1863...}The sewing class interferes with the organisation of the school. The girls are behind the rest of the class in attainments. {January 1864....}We have to unteach what children know at the ladies school. Great complaints have been made with regard to the sewing class conducted by Mrs Harrison. {February 1864...}Mrs Harrison paid off. Mrs Fieldhouse agreeing to take her place.
